item.title: Who Whacked a Top Russian General?
item.description: Suspicion for the hit on GRU Gen. Vladimir Alekseyev falls on Ukraine, but murderous Kremlin rivalries can’t be ruled out

item.title: 'Mission ahead, heavens above'
item.description: Welcome to Fictional Intelligence, the first of a monthly series that explores the future through short stories.

item.title: Checks and Balance newsletter: The danger of prediction markets
item.description: Charlotte Howard, our New York bureau chief, on the cultural and political risks of turning everything into a bet
